argv:
import sys
import subprocess

CONNECTION_ARG = '-Snothing.idc -f {file}'

def launch_ida():
    conn = CONNECTION_ARG.format(file=sys.argv[1])
    ida_location=sys.argv[2]
    ida_process = subprocess.Popen([ida_location, conn])
    ida_process.wait()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    launch_ida()
